game.name: Qbik
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Go on an adventure as a small, one-eyed square, and traverse caves full of puzzles, riddles, and brainteasers! Discover 63 levels and the Level Editor on Steam Workshop!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Go on an adventure as a small, one-eyed square, and traverse caves full of puzzles, riddles, and brainteasers! Discover 63 levels and the Level Editor on Steam Workshop!
